ABOUT.TITLE: About me
ABOUT.INTRO: Hello, I'm Robby. IT is a great source of inspiration for me, as I enjoy constantly learning new things and staying up to date with technology. This exciting field has always fascinated me. It's simply fun to solve problems, code, or develop innovative solutions. The mix of creativity and logic excites me every day anew!
ABOUT.LOCATION: I currently live in Eilenburg. I'm very open to remote work (home office).
ABOUT.LEARNING: I love new technologies and constantly learn - through practice, projects, and further education.
ABOUT.APPROACH: My approach: break down problems analytically, solve them creatively - always with a focus on elegant, efficient results. Perseverance and teamwork help me learn from every challenge.

SKILLS.TITLE: Skill Set
SKILLS.DESCRIPTION: I develop modern web applications with HTML5, CSS3, JavaScript/TypeScript and frameworks such as Angular. Clean code, performance and UX are important to me. As web development is changing rapidly, I am constantly learning - whether new tools, libraries or best practices. Flexibility and adaptability are a matter of course for me.
SKILLS.CONTACT_ME: Feel free to contact me. I look forward to expanding on my previous knowledge.
SKILLS.LEARNING_INTEREST: I have a special interest in learning

PROJECTS.TITLE: Featured Projects
PROJECTS.DESCRIPTION: Discover a selection of my work - Interact with projects to see my skills in action.

JOIN.TITLE: Join
JOIN.DESCRIPTION: Web-based Kanban app for task management: Users can create, organise and track tasks in interactive lists - ideal for individuals or teams.

SHARKIE.TITLE: Sharkie
SHARKIE.DESCRIPTION: Sharkie is a 2D game developed using HTML, JavaScript, and CSS. The game features an exciting underwater adventure where players control a shark navigating through various obstacles and challenges.

DABUBBLE.TITLE: DA Bubble
DABUBBLE.DESCRIPTION: This App is a Slack Clone App. It revolutionizes team communication and collaboration with its intuitive interface, real-time messaging, and robust channel organization.

HEADLINE_SECTION: What my colleagues say about me

TESTIMONIALS.ARNESTO: Robby is a good team colleague to me. He is very organized and has always contributed to maintaining a good atmosphere in the team. It was definitely a positive experience to implement a project with him.
TESTIMONIALS.ALDIN: Working with Robby has always been very pleasant. He not only brings technical expertise, but also impresses with his calm and solution-oriented manner – a real asset for any team. I especially appreciate his reliability: When Robby takes on something, you can 100% rely on it being done on time and with high quality.
TESTIMONIALS.PETER: Working with Robby was not only extremely effective but also consistently characterized by trust and clarity. As a true team player, he convinces with his reliability, structured work approach, and sense of common goals. I was particularly impressed by how he maintains an overview even in challenging situations and motivatingly accompanies the team.

CONTACT.PROBLEM_TO_SOLVE: Do you have a problem to solve?
CONTACT.EXPERTISE_TEXT: Whether it's project management, digitalization, or process optimization – with me by your side, it'll be strategic, creative, and above all, effective. I bring not only expertise but also fresh ideas to your projects.
CONTACT.PRIVACY_AGREEMENT_SECOND_TEXT: and agree to the processing of my data as described.

LEGAL.TITLE: Information according to § 5 DDG
LEGAL.DISCLAIMER:
Disclaimer:

Liability for content

The contents of our pages were created with great care. However, we cannot guarantee that the content is accurate, complete, or up-to-date. As a service provider, we are responsible for our own content on these pages in accordance with § 7 paragraph 1 of the DDG. According to §§ 8 to 10 of the DDG, however, we are not obligated to monitor transmitted or stored third-party information or to investigate circumstances that indicate illegal activity. Obligations to remove or block the use of information in accordance with general laws remain unaffected. However, liability in this respect is only possible from the time of knowledge of a specific legal violation. Upon becoming aware of corresponding legal violations, we will remove this content immediately.
LEGAL.LIABILITY:
Liability for links

Our offer contains links to external websites of third parties, the content of which we have no influence on. Therefore, we cannot assume any liability for this external content. The respective provider or operator of the pages is always responsible for the content of the linked pages. The linked pages were checked for possible legal violations at the time of linking. Illegal content was not recognizable at the time of linking. However, a permanent control of the content of the linked pages is not reasonable without concrete evidence of a violation of the law. Upon becoming aware of legal violations, we will remove such links immediately.
LEGAL.COPYRIGHT:
Copyright

The content and works created by the site operators on these pages are subject to German copyright law. The reproduction, editing, distribution and any kind of use outside the limits of copyright law require the written consent of the respective author or creator. Downloads and copies of this site are only permitted for private, non-commercial use. Should you nevertheless become aware of a copyright infringement, please inform us accordingly. Upon becoming aware of legal violations, we will remove such content immediately.
LEGAL.PRIVACY:
Data protection

The use of our website is generally possible without providing personal data. As far as personal data (for example name, address or email addresses) is collected on our pages, this is always done, as far as possible, on a voluntary basis. This data will not be passed on to third parties without your explicit consent.
We point out that data transmission on the Internet (e.g. when communicating by email) may have security gaps. A complete protection of data against access by third parties is not possible.
